channel.title: [PI] Designate Objects to Certain Heights
channel.description: How would i exactly do this? As far as I know, I have tried to go through all of ObjectManager.java, ObjectHandler.java and Client.java to add the height int, but it just dosen't seem to work. When I place an object it is set to all the heights for the one coordinate. How would I make it set to the designated height?
